Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Declaration REJECTED by MISSING occurs in cases that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration REJECTED by MISSING that are followed by a resubmission (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING compared to the frequency of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING that occur after Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of cases where Declaration REJECTED by MISSING appears more than once in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of variants with Declaration REJECTED by MISSING that do not result in a completed reimbursement (i.e., do not end with Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING relative to the total number of rejection activities (including all 'Declaration REJECTED by ...' activities)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING events that are immediately preceded by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing Declaration REJECTED by MISSING that originate from domestic declarations (inferred via absence of pre-approval steps)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING that occur in variants also containing Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING events associated with claim amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of all rejection-related activities that are specifically Declaration REJECTED by MISSING
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING in variants that include rework loops (i.e., repeated submissions after rejection)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING that are followed within the same case by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of distinct cases in which Declaration REJECTED by MISSING occurs
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING relative to the total number of times any activity is performed after Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Ratio of variants ending with Declaration REJECTED by MISSING to variants that recover and reach Payment Handled after such rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by MISSING occurring in 2018 compared to 2017
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases
